content.raw:
I'm unable to find gzsdf in any of the gazebo4 packages on trusty with indigo:

```
ahb> lsb_release -d  
Description:    Ubuntu 14.04.1 LTS

ahb> dpkg -l | grep gazebo
ii  gazebo4                                                     4.0.1-2~trusty                                      amd64        Open Source Robotics Simulator
ii  gazebo4-common                                              4.0.1-2~trusty                                      all          Open Source Robotics Simulator - Shared files
ii  gazebo4-doc                                                 4.0.1-2~trusty                                      all          Open Source Robotics Simulator - Documentation
ii  gazebo4-plugin-base                                         4.0.1-2~trusty                                      amd64        Open Source Robotics Simulator - base plug-ins
ii  libgazebo4:amd64                                            4.0.1-2~trusty                                      amd64        Open Source Robotics Simulator - shared library
ii  libgazebo4-dev:amd64                                        4.0.1-2~trusty                                      amd64        Open Source Robotics Simulator - Development Files
ii  ros-indigo-gazebo4-msgs                                     2.4.6-0trusty                                       amd64        Message and service data structures for interacting with Gazebo from ROS.
ii  ros-indigo-gazebo4-plugins                                  2.4.6-0trusty                                       amd64        Robot-independent Gazebo plugins for sensors, motors and dynamic reconfigurable components.
ii  ros-indigo-gazebo4-ros                                      2.4.6-0trusty                                       amd64        Provides ROS plugins that offer message and service publishers for interfacing with Gazebo through ROS. Formally simulator_gazebo/gazebo
ii  ros-indigo-gazebo4-ros-control                              2.4.6-0trusty                                       amd64        gazebo_ros_control
ii  ros-indigo-gazebo4-ros-pkgs                                 2.4.6-0trusty                                       amd64        Interface for using ROS with the Gazebo simulator.

ahb> dpkg -L $(dpkg -l | grep gazebo | awk '{print $2}') | grep gzsdf
```

*nothing*
content.html:
I'm unable to find gzsdf in any of the gazebo4 packages on trusty with indigo:

ahb> lsb_release -d  
Description:    Ubuntu 14.04.1 LTS

ahb> dpkg -l | grep gazebo
ii  gazebo4                                                     4.0.1-2~trusty                                      amd64        Open Source Robotics Simulator
ii  gazebo4-common                                              4.0.1-2~trusty                                      all          Open Source Robotics Simulator - Shared files
ii  gazebo4-doc                                                 4.0.1-2~trusty                                      all          Open Source Robotics Simulator - Documentation
ii  gazebo4-plugin-base                                         4.0.1-2~trusty                                      amd64        Open Source Robotics Simulator - base plug-ins
ii  libgazebo4:amd64                                            4.0.1-2~trusty                                      amd64        Open Source Robotics Simulator - shared library
ii  libgazebo4-dev:amd64                                        4.0.1-2~trusty                                      amd64        Open Source Robotics Simulator - Development Files
ii  ros-indigo-gazebo4-msgs                                     2.4.6-0trusty                                       amd64        Message and service data structures for interacting with Gazebo from ROS.
ii  ros-indigo-gazebo4-plugins                                  2.4.6-0trusty                                       amd64        Robot-independent Gazebo plugins for sensors, motors and dynamic reconfigurable components.
ii  ros-indigo-gazebo4-ros                                      2.4.6-0trusty                                       amd64        Provides ROS plugins that offer message and service publishers for interfacing with Gazebo through ROS. Formally simulator_gazebo/gazebo
ii  ros-indigo-gazebo4-ros-control                              2.4.6-0trusty                                       amd64        gazebo_ros_control
ii  ros-indigo-gazebo4-ros-pkgs                                 2.4.6-0trusty                                       amd64        Interface for using ROS with the Gazebo simulator.

ahb> dpkg -L $(dpkg -l | grep gazebo | awk '{print $2}') | grep gzsdf

nothing
